name: Draw Towards A Consuming Void
effect:
Gather 1 {explorer}, {town}, {city}, {dahan}, {presence}, and {beast} from each adjacent land.

4 {fear}. 15 Damage. 5 Damage to {dahan}. Destroy 1 {presence} from each Spirit. Remove 2 {beast}.

threshold.conditionText: If you have no other Power cards in play
threshold.effectText: *Any number of times:* Forget a Minor Power, a Major Power, and a Unique Power to perform the above effects again.
